intro_text: Start supporting your customers in no time, by completing the tasks below.

learn.title: Introduction
learn.description: Take a quick video tour for an introduction to Kayako's effortless, personal customer support experience.
learn.video_text: Watch this two minute video to see first-hand how Kayako will work for you and your team.
learn.slide_2_text: The inbox is where you’ll find conversations that need your attention.
learn.slide_3_text: Views are like smart folders. They let you switch between specific subsets of your conversations.
learn.slide_4_text: The conversation brings together every message, reply, and customer activity – all in one place.
learn.slide_5_text: To respond to a customer, you’ll write your reply in the text box. You can add images and formatting for rich, engaging conversations.
learn.slide_6_text: On the sidebar, you’ll set support workflow fields, fill in custom data, and assign conversations to teams or specific agents.

experience.title: Experience Kayako
experience.description: Take the tour and find out how you reply to customers and deliver effortless and personal customer service.

setup.title: Quick start
setup.email_description: Configure your default Kayako email address, or forward an external support email address into Kayako.
setup.social_description: Connect your Twitter and Facebook accounts to manage social support requests from Kayako.
setup.messenger_description: Configure and enable Kayako Messenger for a better way to provide live chat support.
setup.team_description: Group agents into functional teams – like Support, Sales, or Billing – to help keep your conversations organized.
setup.agents_description: Get your team on board so they can start replying to your customers.
setup.complete_cases_description: Take Kayako for a test run by having a few test conversations with your coworkers or friends.

initial.title: Start receiving emails
initial.heading: Do you receive support emails from your customers today?
initial.secondarybutton: No, create an address for me

emailForwarding.step1: 1. Log into your email system and go to your email forwarding settings.
emailForwarding.step2: 2. Enter support{domain} as the forwarding email address.
emailForwarding.copyinstructions: Copy instructions to send to your email administrator
emailForwarding.instructionstext:
1. Log into your email system and go to your email forwarding settings.
2. Enter support{domain} as the forwarding email address.
Step by step instructions: https://support.kayako.com/article/1283-forwarding-emails-to-kayako-from-external-domains

connected.heading: All set!
connected.subheading: Kayako will send your emails on behalf of your email address.
connected.liveconversationsdescription: To ensure the best email experience for your customers, there are two more steps that we recommend you do: add SPF protection and enable DKIM authentication.
connected.copyinstructions: Copy instructions to send to your email and IT administrator
connected.instructionstext:
To ensure the best email experience for our customers, there are two steps we need to complete to finish setting up Kayako, our customer service platform.
We need to edit our DNS records to enable SPF and DKIM authentication.
Here is the information: https://support.kayako.com/article/1197-protecting-your-emails-from-spam-filters

create.title: Create a new support address
create.label: All emails sent to this address will be turned into conversations in Kayako.

created.heading: All set!
created.subheading: Emails sent to {address} will automatically become conversations in Kayako.
created.subheadingdefault: Emails sent to your default email address will automatically become conversations in Kayako.
created.tryout: Try it out! Send an email and watch it appear in your inbox. You can edit or add other email addresses in your admin settings at any time.

initial.title: Link your social accounts
initial.heading: Do you use Facebook or Twitter to communicate to customers?
initial.fact: Did you know that 67% of customers have used social media for support?

connect.twitterdescription: Your team can have conversations with customers over Twitter. Kayako will create conversations for @ mentions and direct messages.
connect.facebookdescription: Your customers can send messages from your Facebook page. Incoming messages are captured and added as new conversations in Kayako.
connect.facebookpagessuccess: Facebook Page (or Pages if multiple) connected!

done.heading: All set!
done.subheading: Your social mentions and messages are now flowing into your Kayako inbox. You can edit and add other Twitter accounts or Facebook pages from the admin area at any time.

embedCode.heading: Kayako Messenger is now live on your Help Center.
embedCode.subheading: You can also add Kayako Messenger to any other website or app you own. Add the embed code below to start talking to your visitors immediately.
embedCode.welcomeMessage: How can we help? We’d love to know what brought you to {brand}
embedCode.helptext: Add this code to your web pages just before the </body> tag

done.heading: All set!
done.subheading: Your Kayako Messenger is now enabled - your customers can use its modern messaging interface to talk to your support team in real-time. You can adjust your Messenger configuration or copy the embed code anytime from the admin area.

initial.dontwant: I don’t want to do this

add.description:
Teams are groups of agents organized according to their function. For example you might have three separate teams for Support, Sales, and Billing.

Conversations can be assigned either to a specific agent or to the team as a whole. You can create as many teams as you like, and agents can belong to multiple teams.

Add a descriptive name for your default team here, and create additional teams, if you like.

done.heading: All set!
done.subheading: You can now organize your conversations according to which team should handle them. You can edit or add teams in the admin area whenever you need to.

initial.title: Invite the gang
initial.heading: Bring your team onto Kayako, and help solve customer issues together.
initial.dontwant: I don’t want to do this

done.heading: All set!
done.subheading: We've created accounts for your agents on Kayako and sent emails to help them log in and get started. You can create additional agent accounts from the admin area at any time.

conversations.title: Take a test drive
conversations.heading: Ask a few coworkers to send you an email so you can take Kayako for a test drive. Set three conversations to 'Complete', in order to tick this item off your to-do list!
conversations.dontwant: I don’t want to do this
